Name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
Title: The Bestest Travel Companion!
Desc: "You might be only one of countless stars, but you're Paimon's whole world!"
Source: Reward for meeting the Player Manual's requirements

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
